entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
